repeat for each line theLine of myText put "(" & theLine & ")" after myBracketedText end repeat
repeat for each chunkType counterVariable of chunkableVariable commands end repeat

Break up the given variable chunkableVariable into the specified chunks (byte, character, word, item, line) and then repeat the given commands for each of them, setting the counter variable given to that chunk of the chunkableVariable.

repeat for each entry theItem of myArray put "," && theItem after listAsText end repeat
repeat for each entry counterVariable of arrayVariable commands end repeat
For each array entry in the given array, run the given commands once for each of them setting the given local variable counterVariable to that array entry.
